sqlMap.select: SELECT stocks.stock_id, stocks.supply_id, supplies.item_name, stocks.date_added, stocks.purchase_date, stocks.reference_no, stocks.quantity, stocks.last_user, stocks.last_update FROM supplies_stocks_2 stocks, supplies_2 supplies WHERE stocks.supply_id = supplies.supply_id ORDER BY stocks.stock_id

SELECT stocks.stock_id, stocks.supply_id, supplies.item_name, stocks.date_added, stocks.purchase_date, stocks.reference_no, stocks.quantity, stocks.last_user, stocks.last_update FROM supplies_stocks_2 stocks, supplies_2 supplies WHERE stocks.supply_id = supplies.supply_id AND UPPER(supplies.item_name) LIKE '%'||#itemName#||'%' ORDER BY stocks.stock_id
SELECT supply_id, item_name, obsolete_tag FROM supplies_2 WHERE obsolete_tag = 'N' ORDER BY supply_id
sqlMap.insert: UPDATE supplies_2 SET actual_count = actual_count + #qty# WHERE supply_id = #idSupply#
UPDATE supplies_2 SET actual_count = (actual_count - #prevQty#) + #qty# WHERE supply_id = #idSupply#

INSERT INTO supplies_stocks_2 (stock_id, supply_id, date_added, purchase_date, reference_no, quantity, last_user, last_update ) VALUES (seq_supply_id_2.NEXTVAL, #idSupply#, #dateAdded#, #datePurchased#, #numReference#, #qty#, #user#, SYSDATE )

UPDATE supplies_stocks_2 SET quantity = #qty#, reference_no = #numReference#, date_added = #dateAdded#, purchase_date = #datePurchased#, last_user = #user#, last_update = SYSDATE WHERE stock_id = #idStock#
